channel.title: Comments on: Happy Birthday Ed and other comments

item.title: By: Ed Brill
item.dc:creator: Ed Brill
item.description: <p>Thanks on the birthday, and for your other insightful comments. I was at a training session yesterday where some of my colleagues and partners echoed your last sentence. I may link to it in a bit...</p>
item.content:encoded: Thanks on the birthday, and for your other insightful comments. I was at a training session yesterday where some of my colleagues and partners echoed your last sentence. I may link to it in a bit…
